institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 34 (Changes to Business Operation)
contents: Article 34 (Changes to business operation) In accordance with Article 14 (2) of the Regulations, the joint training center must submit changes to the Corporation by the scheduled date of change in any of the following cases: 1. Joint training center If the name of the organization changes, 2. If the address of the joint training center changes, 3. If the business registration number of the joint training center changes, Newly established on April 25, 2023, 4. Status of joint training center due to corporate merger, etc. In case of change, new establishment: April 25, 2023.
